articles.title: Placido Domingo's name comes up in Argentina sex sect probe
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Opera star Placido Domingo's name has appeared in an investigation of a sect-like organization in Argentina that also had U.S. offices and whose leaders have been charged with crimes, including sexual exploitation.
articles.content:

articles.title: Lisandro Martinez at Manchester United: Is 5'9" height a problem for Argentina defender in the Premier League?
articles.description: Lisandro Martinezs height is the focus of attention but is that really going to stop him becoming a Premier League success? Manchester Uniteds struggles against Brighton and Brentford are a bad sign but it is too soon to judge the defender, argues Adam Bate

articles.title: Argentina prosecutor seeks 12-year jail sentence for VP Kirchner
articles.description: An Argentine federal prosecutor requested a 12-year prison sentence on Monday for Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, the country's former president and current vice president, on corruption charges related to public works.
articles.content: Argentina's Vice President and President of the Senate, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, looks on as lawmakers meet to debate and vote an agreement with the International Monetary Fund (IMF), at the National Congress in Buenos Aires, Argentina March 1... [1905 chars]

articles.title: Premier League: Arsenal power into first place, Harry Kane makes history
articles.description: Kane's 185th top-flight goal for Tottenham took him above Argentina striker Sergio Aguero's total of 184 during his time at Manchester City.
articles.content:
Kane's 185th top-flight goal for Tottenham took him above Argentina striker Sergio Aguero's total of 184 during his time at Manchester City.
